caption: Several women were having a conversation. A man sat in a car talking on the phone. A woman entered an office building, and she came face to face with a man in a suit. The woman went up the stairs, and the scene shifted to an open-air event. A woman in a black dress was holding a wine glass and talking to a man in white. At this moment, another man in black clothing arrived, and a woman fell into a pool with him. A woman in black clothes entered a room and encountered another person. Three women were having breakfast at a dining table. A woman carried clothes, and in another room, a photographer was taking pictures with a camera, while the others held hangers. A man held a water bottle, mimicking a gun with his hand and gesturing towards a woman.
